name: Ripple AI
description: Ripple is an all-in-one marketing platform that uses AI to help small brands plan and generate content, run ads, manage email and SMS campaigns, and gain insights from their data.
one_liner: Ripple is an all-in-one marketing platform that uses AI to help small brands plan and generate content, run ads, manage email and SMS campaigns, and gain insights from their data.
location: New York City, New York, United States
